name: Jöphie
description:
Jöphie
Laufey

In the God of War Series[]
God of War (2018)[]
Before her passing, Faye had a pet gyrfalcon that she named Jöphie. It was a smart and loyal bird that she had by her side for years.  When Kratos was gone hunting. Laufey and Atreus would play with each other and she would call to Jöphie, her trustworthy pet. Atreus would try to call her but she won't come to him. She would only when Laufey called her. After Laufey's death she hid somewhere.
Trivia[]
Faye had a gyrfalcon named Jöphie. Atreus would call to her, but she would only respond to his mother. (God of War, J.M Barlog, Chapter 3 page 19.)
While the novel states that Jöphie’s species is a gyrfalcon, in the concept art she is an owl.
